report.title: Species counts league using standard params
report.description: A filtered league table of species counts by location. Requires the spatial index builder.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key) as count FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false and lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN samples s on s.id=ils.sample_id JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON o.website_id=su.website_id and o.survey_id=su.id and o.sample_id=ils.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# AND #sharing_filter# #filters# ) ON ils.location_id=l.id WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# AND (l.public=true or lw.id IS NOT NULL) AND (l.code NOT LIKE ('%+%') OR l.code IS NULL) GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.
